Number of packets in the aggregated flows
Number of bytes in the aggregated flows
System uptime when the first packet was switched
System uptime when the last packet was switched
Source IP address ANDed with the source prefix mask, or the prefix to which the source IP address of the aggregated flows belongs
Destination IP address ANDed with the destination prefix mask

Number of bits in the source prefix

Destination User Datagram Protocol (UDP) or TCP port number
SNMP index of the input interface
SNMP index of the output interface
pageTitle: NetFlow Configuration Guide, Cisco IOS Release 15S - Configuring NetFlow Aggregation Caches [Support] - Cisco
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {188328=The following example shows how to configure a prefix aggregation cache with a cache size of 2046, an inactive timeout of 200 seconds, a cache active timeout of 45 minutes, an export destination IP address of 10.42.42.1, and a destination port of 9992:, 189392=The following example shows how to configure a protocol port aggregation cache with a cache size of 2046, an inactive timeout of 200 seconds, a cache active timeout of 45 minutes, an export destination IP address of 10.42.42.1, and a destination port of 9992:, 155796=Router(config-flow-cache)# cache entries 2048, 190470=The following example shows how to configure a source prefix aggregation cache with a cache size of 2046, an inactive timeout of 200 seconds, a cache active timeout of 45 minutes, an export destination IP address of 10.42.42.1, and a destination port of 9992:, 187248=The following example shows how to configure a destination prefix aggregation cache with a cache size of 2046, an inactive timeout of 200 seconds, a cache active timeout of 45 minutes, an export destination IP address of 10.42.42.1, and a destination port of 9992:, 186277=The following example shows how to configure an AS aggregation cache with a cache size of 2046, an inactive timeout of 200 seconds, a cache active timeout of 45 minutes, an export destination IP address of 10.42.42.1, and a destination port of 9992:}
textBeforeTable: Data Export Record Term Definitions for Prefix-Port Aggregation Scheme Table 8 The table below lists definitions for the data export record terms used in the prefix-port aggregation scheme. Data Export Record for Prefix-Port Aggregation Scheme Figure 7 This aggregation scheme is particularly useful for capturing data with which you can examine the sources and destinations of network traffic passing through a NetFlow-enabled device. The figure below shows the data export record for the prefix-port aggregation scheme. For a definition of the data export terms used in the aggregation scheme, see the table below. Time stamp when the first packet was switched and time stamp when the last packet was switched Number of packets summarized by the aggregation record Number of bytes summarized by the aggregated record Number of flows summarized by the aggregated record ToS byte Protocol Destination interface Source interface Destination port
textAfterTable: NetFlow Prefix-ToS Aggregation Scheme The NetFlow prefix-tos aggregation scheme groups together flows that have a common source prefix, source mask, destination prefix, destination mask, source BGP AS, destination BGP AS, input interface, output interface, and ToS byte. The aggregated NetFlow export record reports the following: Source prefix Source prefix mask Destination prefix Destination prefix mask Source AS Destination AS Source interface Destination interface ToS byte Number of flows summarized by the aggregated record Number of bytes summarized by the aggregated record Number of packets summarized by the aggregated record Time stamp when the first packet was switched and time stamp when the last packet was switched This aggregation scheme is particularly useful for capturing data so that you can examine the sources and destinations of network traffic passing through a NetFlow-enabled device. The figure below displays the data export format for the prefix-tos
